001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.extension;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.Ripper;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.decorators.DecoratorsFactory;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.log.LogQuest;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.parameters.DataRipper;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.Quest;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.SuperQuest;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StorageKeysTest;
010import io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.ReflectionUtil;
011import java.util.Arrays;
012import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterTestExecutionCallback;
013import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
014import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
015import org.springframework.test.context.junit.jupiter.SpringExtension;
016
017import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.config.FrameworkConfigHolder.getFrameworkConfig;
018import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StoreKeys.QUEST;
019
020/**
021 * JUnit 5 {@code AfterTestExecutionCallback} extension that handles post-test execution cleanup.
022 *
023 * <p>This extension processes test data cleanup using the {@code Ripper} annotation, ensuring
024 * that any specified targets are properly eliminated after the test execution.
025 *
026 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
027 */
028public class RipperMan implements AfterTestExecutionCallback {
029
030   /**
031    * Executes after the test method finishes execution.
032    *
033    * <p>This method checks if the test method is annotated with {@code Ripper} and invokes the
034    * corresponding cleanup logic for the specified targets.
035    *
036    * @param context The test execution context containing metadata about the test.
037    * @throws Exception If any error occurs during post-test execution cleanup.
038    */
039   @Override
040   public void afterTestExecution(final ExtensionContext context) throws Exception {
041      context.getTestMethod().ifPresent(method -> {
042         Ripper annotation = method.getAnnotation(Ripper.class);
043         if (annotation != null) {
044            executeRipperLogic(context, annotation.targets());
045         }
046      });
047   }
048
049   /**
050    * Executes cleanup logic for the specified targets defined in the {@code Ripper} annotation.
051    *
052    * <p>This method retrieves the necessary test context, resolves dependencies,
053    * and invokes the corresponding data elimination operations.
054    *
055    * @param context The test execution context.
056    * @param targets The targets specified in the {@code Ripper} annotation for cleanup.
057    */
058   private void executeRipperLogic(ExtensionContext context, String[] targets) {
059      LogQuest.info("The ripper has arrived");
060
061      ApplicationContext appCtx = SpringExtension.getApplicationContext(context);
062      DecoratorsFactory decoratorsFactory = appCtx.getBean(DecoratorsFactory.class);
063      Quest quest = (Quest) context.getStore(ExtensionContext.Namespace.GLOBAL).get(QUEST);
064      SuperQuest superQuest = decoratorsFactory.decorate(quest, SuperQuest.class);
065      if (quest == null) {
066         throw new IllegalStateException("Quest not found in the global store");
067      }
068
069      superQuest.getStorage().sub(StorageKeysTest.ARGUMENTS).createLateArguments();
070
071      Arrays.stream(targets).forEach(target -> {
072         DataRipper<?> dataRipper = ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(
073               DataRipper.class, target, getFrameworkConfig().projectPackages());
074
075         dataRipper.eliminate().accept(superQuest);
076         LogQuest.info("DataRipper processed target: '{}'.", target);
077      });
078   }
079
080}
081
